For your information, I get the above error by
```table(file[:,2])```
where
```typeof(file[:,1])
Vector{Float64} (alias for Array{Float64, 1})```
and
```typeof(file)
Matrix{Float64} (alias for Array{Float64, 2})```

text:
Okay!
One more thing,
DataFrames vs Julia Arrays/Vectors
Which ones are generally faster?

elements.text:
Okay!
One more thing,
DataFrames vs Julia Arrays/Vectors
Which ones are generally faster?

text: "faster" is meaningless here. MLJ wants a table bc it requires some metadata like feature names. DataFrame is a particular table. It's backed by vectors. If your dataset size is < 1GB don't worry about this (and if it is, it would still not be the right question but then you'd ask this on discourse and people would mention special julia packages to deal with large dataset sizes, typically these will be tables as well).

elements.text: "faster" is meaningless here. MLJ wants a table bc it requires some metadata like feature names. DataFrame is a particular table. It's backed by vectors.
